```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,

```

```{r eval = use_dt}
DT::datatable(nflreadr::dictionary_snap_counts,
              options = list(scrollX = TRUE, pageLength = 25),
              filter = "top",
              rownames = FALSE
)
```

```{r eval = !use_dt}
knitr::kable(nflreadr::dictionary_snap_counts)
```
